item.title: By: Factory
item.dc:creator: Factory
item.description: Hmm, WC3 had one level where you were effectively competing against the 'evil' faction, wherein they were trying to convert all the population of a town into demons (or undead, I can't remember), and you were trying to stop this occurance by killing the inhabitants before they were able to be converted. I think Blizzard is trying to tell us something... :)
item.content:encoded:
Hmm, WC3 had one level where you were effectively competing against the ‘evil’ faction, wherein they were trying to convert all the population of a town into demons (or undead, I can’t remember), and you were trying to stop this occurance by killing the inhabitants before they were able to be converted.
I think Blizzard is trying to tell us something… ðŸ™‚
